sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_acb78223db68ab4050479eb6db9619b5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.OCIO_SR_Call_Record_Details</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>OCIO_SR_Call_Record_Details</name><script><![CDATA[var OCIO_SR_Call_Record_Details = Class.create();
OCIO_SR_Call_Record_Details.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
/**
 *
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * Populate Call record details to the catalog for New calls. Its called by client script in General Service Request 
 * SB-988 31-OCT-218 Mathew Kuriakose -Updated Org to Requested for company
 * Copyright to BC Public Service - Service Request
 */
	
	    call_info: function() {
		var CallRecord = this.getParameter('sysparam_CallRecord');
		var cart_item = this.getParameter('sysparam_cart_item');	
		var result = this.newItem("result");
		var call_details = new GlideRecord('new_call');
		call_details.addQuery('sys_id',CallRecord);
		call_details.query();
		if(call_details.next())
			{
var copyAtt = new GlideSysAttachment();			
copyAtt.copy('new_call',call_details.sys_id,'sc_cart_item',cart_item);
				result.setAttribute("call_short_desc",call_details.short_description);
			    result.setAttribute("call_req_for", call_details.u_requested_for);
				result.setAttribute("call_req_by", call_details.caller);
				result.setAttribute("call_im_req_for", call_details.u_requested_for.company);
				result.setAttribute("call_description", call_details.description);


				
			}
	},

	
    type: 'OCIO_SR_Call_Record_Details'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-20 22:00:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>acb78223db68ab4050479eb6db9619b5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>26</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIO_SR_Call_Record_Details</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_acb78223db68ab4050479eb6db9619b5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKO</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-31 23:16:21</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_e0ded4f4db256300fe199236db9619f5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="General Service Request">be15a52bdbe4ab4050479eb6db961928</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Default Group Blank</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[//set the default grop from variable set blank-JIRA

/***
 *
 * History
 * JIRA    Date         Developer               Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------          ------------------------
 * SB-963   10/31/2018  Mathew Kuriakose        Set the default group from variable set blank
 * 
 * Copyright to BC Public Service - Service Request
 */

function onLoad() {
g_form.setValue('sc_task_assignmentGroupName','');   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKO</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-31 18:21:08</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e0ded4f4db256300fe199236db9619f5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Default Group Blank</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_e0ded4f4db256300fe199236db9619f5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKO</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-31 23:49:17</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
